summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 5.2°C), outside temperature (down 5.1°C), and inside temperature (down 1.9°C).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), dew point temperature (up 8.6°C), feels like temperature (up 9.0°C), and outside temperature (up 8.9°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced and mostly calm with light air movement. Showers, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and bright sunshine will dominate the day. The weather will likely remain the same.
